com.geolud.atomica.logic

Class Editor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.geolud.atomica.logic.Editor

  • public class Editor
extends Observable
    The class contains the application logic for creating an initial game situation.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Editor.EditorMode
      The different modes of an Editor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Editor(GameSettings gameSettings)
      Creates an Editor instance with a GameSituation defined by the given DefaultGameSettings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Editor

        public Editor(GameSettings gameSettings)
        Creates an Editor instance with a GameSituation defined by the given DefaultGameSettings.
        Parameters:
        gameSettings - the game settings which defines the initial GameSituation

    • Method Detail

      • changeCols

        public void changeCols(int cols)
        Changes the boards number of columns. Will delete all Tokens in current GameSituation.
        Parameters:
        cols - number of columns

      • changeRows

        public void changeRows(int rows)
        Changes the boards number of rows. Will remove all Tokens in current GameSituation.
        Parameters:
        rows - number of rows

      • clearSituation

        public void clearSituation()
        Removes all Tokens in current GameSituation.

      • getCols

        public int getCols()
        Returns the number of columns in current GameSituation.
        Returns:
        the number of columns

      • getField

        public Field getField(int col,
             int row)
        Returns the Field instance at the given Position.
        Parameters:
        col - the column of the field
        row - the row of the field
        Returns:
        the field at the given position

      • placeToken

        public boolean placeToken(Token token,
                 int col,
                 int row)
        Places the given Token on the Field (col, row). If the Field is not empty and or a new Molecule could be created, the token will not be placed.
        Parameters:
        token - the Token to be placed on the Field
        col - the column of the destination Field
        row - the row of the destination Field
        Returns:
        true if Token could be placed

      • queryToken

        public Token queryToken(int col,
               int row)
        Checks if there is a Token on the given Position and returns it.
        Parameters:
        col - the column of the Field
        row - the row of the Field
        Returns:
        the Token at the given Position

      • removeToken

        public void removeToken(int col,
               int row)
        Removes a Token at the given Position.
        Parameters:
        col - the column of the Field
        row - the row of the Field

      • setMode

        public void setMode(Editor.EditorMode mode)
        Sets the Editor mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - the new mode.

      • setNumberOfColors

        public void setNumberOfColors(int numberOfColors)
        Sets the number of colors and removes invalid Tokens from current GameSituation.
        Parameters:
        numberOfColors - the new number of colors

      • setSituation

        public void setSituation(GameSituation gameSituation)
        Replaces current GameSituation.
        Parameters:
        gameSituation - the new GameSituation
